report.title: Time lapse species list
report.description: Report to populate the list of species available for a time-lapse map.
report.query: SELECT DISTINCT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN samples smp on smp.id=o.sample_id and smp.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: sample_method
param.join: JOIN cache_termlists_terms t on t.id=smp.sample_method_id and t.term = '#sample_method#'
